tone: A grimdark sword-and-sorcery world of blood, ruin, and fate — where heroes claw meaning from the bones of dead gods.

cards.name: The Fool
cards.meaning: A wanderer unburdened by reason or fate, stepping into the unknown where madness and glory share a cup.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.meaning: Will made flesh; mastery over chaos through the illusion of control. The Magician bends power, but power bends back.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.meaning: Keeper of veiled truths; her silence is a weapon sharper than any blade.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.meaning: Mother of decay and rebirth, her touch brings both harvest and ruin.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.meaning: A ruler forged in blood; his law is carved into the bones of the fallen.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.meaning: A priest of hollow gods; faith as a chain, not a path.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.meaning: Union through destruction; passion that burns the world clean.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.meaning: Victory through domination; the wheel crushes both enemy and self.

cards.name: Strength
cards.meaning: Courage is a beast tamed only by will; blood answers to neither mercy nor fear.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.meaning: The light of solitude reveals that truth is an abyss, not a path.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.meaning: The turning of fate grinds men into dust and kings into beggars.

cards.name: Justice
cards.meaning: Balance bought with blood; the scales never weigh mercy.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.meaning: Sacrifice without redemption; enlightenment found at the edge of despair.

cards.name: Death
cards.meaning: The end that births beginnings; decay is life’s cruel twin.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.meaning: Harmony forged through pain; the alchemy of endurance and surrender.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.meaning: Temptation’s master; the soul’s chains are forged from its own desire.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.meaning: Collapse of hubris; a divine hand tears down what mortals build in arrogance.

cards.name: The Star
cards.meaning: Hope flickers in the ruins; faith as fragile as glass, yet radiant still.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.meaning: The madness of the night; truth wears a mask of silver lies.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.meaning: Triumph radiant yet blinding; light reveals as much as it burns away.

cards.name: Judgment
cards.meaning: The dead rise not for mercy, but to see justice done in fire.

cards.name: The World
cards.meaning: Completion, hollow and inevitable; the serpent devours its own tail.

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.meaning: A heart’s first stirring, or the first drop of madness overflowing.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.meaning: A bond forged in desire or desperation; unity that may yet sour to blood.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.meaning: Joy drunk deep enough to drown; revelry before the storm.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.meaning: Complacency in comfort; the rot of contentment before collapse.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.meaning: Loss unheeded; tears fall on ground too dry to drink them.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.meaning: Memories sweetened by decay; nostalgia for a world that never was.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.meaning: Illusion’s banquet; every cup a trap for the thirsty soul.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.meaning: Abandonment of false sanctuaries; walking away from the corpse of comfort.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.meaning: Desire fulfilled, yet never sated; the feast that leaves the heart hollow.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.meaning: Harmony achieved through denial; the dream that devours waking life.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.meaning: The first cut that divides truth from delusion; every edge demands blood.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.meaning: Balance through blindness; indecision carved in steel.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.meaning: Heartbreak as revelation; pain as the truest teacher.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.meaning: Rest upon a bed of blades; peace that cuts both ways.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.meaning: Victory stripped of honor; the taste of triumph soured by treachery.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.meaning: Passage through sorrow; every oarstroke carries the weight of regret.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.meaning: Deceit in motion; the quiet theft of fate.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.meaning: Trapped by one’s own fears; a prison built from thought and shame.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.meaning: Nightmares with open eyes; torment that wears the face of truth.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.meaning: The end of all things; betrayal complete, ruin absolute.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.meaning: A spark of creation or destruction; the fire does not care what it consumes.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.meaning: Ambition set aflame; the world awaits the next conquest.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.meaning: Vision beyond the known; hunger for what lies beyond the edge.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.meaning: Celebration built on ashes; victory that costs more than it grants.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.meaning: Strife as sport; the endless struggle that defines all life.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.meaning: Triumph earned through scars; glory fades, the wounds remain.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.meaning: Defiance against the tide; one stands though all others fall.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.meaning: Momentum unchained; speed that crushes hesitation beneath its feet.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.meaning: The survivor’s burden; resolve tempered by endless war.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.meaning: Labor without rest; strength broken beneath the weight of its own ambition.

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.meaning: The first stone laid upon a foundation of greed or survival.

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Balance amid chaos; fortune’s wheel spun by trembling hands.

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Craft as devotion; the maker’s pride is kin to ruin.

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Greed as armor; wealth becomes its keeper’s cage.

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Exile, hunger, and the cold indifference of gods and men.

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Charity as vanity; the giver and beggar both bound in debt.

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Patience curdled into obsession; waiting for fruit that never ripens.

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Perfection pursued to madness; creation without purpose.

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Luxury earned on backs of ghosts; solitude dressed in silk.

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.meaning: Legacy built on graves; inheritance of dust and bone.

professions.name: Alchemist
professions.description: A seeker of forbidden transformations; one who mistakes corruption for wisdom.

professions.name: Apothecary
professions.description: A healer who knows that every cure carries a cost; mercy measured in draughts of poison.

professions.name: Armorer
professions.description: A craftsman who forges safety from the pain of others; every plate echoes with screams.

professions.name: Assassin
professions.description: A shadow in human form; the hand that ends kings and beggars alike.

professions.name: Archer
professions.description: A hunter whose arrows speak truer than his tongue; distance is his mercy.

professions.name: Bard
professions.description: A chronicler of ruin; their verses are both song and curse.

professions.name: Bounty Hunter
professions.description: One who chases men for coin, yet always runs from his own sins.

professions.name: Blacksmith
professions.description: The hammer’s priest, beating faith into molten iron.

professions.name: Captain of the Guard
professions.description: A weary sentinel who holds the line between order and oblivion.

professions.name: Cleric
professions.description: A vessel for fading gods; his prayers are answered only in blood.

professions.name: Druid
professions.description: A worshipper of tooth and root; the wild answers their call in teeth and rot.

professions.name: Falconer
professions.description: Master of the skies; his talons are merely borrowed from his beasts.

professions.name: Fighter
professions.description: A soldier of endless wars; his faith is the steel he wields.

professions.name: Gladiator
professions.description: A performer in the theater of blood; every cheer another scar.

professions.name: Healer
professions.description: A mender of flesh and breaker of souls; mercy and cruelty are twins in her hands.

professions.name: Hunter
professions.description: Predator of beasts and men alike; hunger is his only creed.

professions.name: Inquisitor
professions.description: The flame that purifies; the lash that redeems. Truth burns brightest in screams.

professions.name: Jester
professions.description: A fool who speaks wisdom wrapped in madness; laughter hides the blade.

professions.name: Knight
professions.description: A servant of ideals long dead; his armor is a tomb of duty.

professions.name: Mercenary
professions.description: Loyal only to coin; his blade sings the song of silver and sin.

professions.name: Necromancer
professions.description: One who commands the silence of the grave and listens for answers only the dead can give.

professions.name: Oracle
professions.description: A seer whose visions come at the cost of sanity; truth devours those who seek it.

professions.name: Paladin
professions.description: A zealot encased in righteousness; salvation through slaughter.

professions.name: Ranger
professions.description: A ghost of the wilderness; the hunt is his prayer and his curse.

professions.name: Rogue
professions.description: A hand in every purse, a dagger in every back; loyalty sold cheap.

professions.name: Scholar
professions.description: A collector of forbidden words; wisdom gnaws at the mind that holds it.

professions.name: Shaman
professions.description: A voice for the dead winds; spirit and flesh walk as one within him.

professions.name: Squire
professions.description: An apprentice in servitude; dreams of honor fade beneath a master's shadow.

professions.name: Tanner
professions.description: Skin is his trade; flesh is his art. He knows the worth of every hide.

professions.name: Wizard
professions.description: Bearer of secret fire; power demands a price none can long afford.

professions.name: Artist
professions.description: A sculptor of nightmares and beauty alike; his canvas bleeds truth.

professions.name: Guard
professions.description: A nameless protector of crumbling walls; duty endures where faith does not.

professions.name: Brute
professions.description: A weapon shaped by suffering; his hands know only ruin.
